The zeroth impression

They often say that the first impression is the lst impression. When youre making a website, the landing page is often considered as the first impression since it is the first thing that the user sees. Hence this project focuses on creating the zeroth impression way before the first impression in the form of an animation. This shall be taken as an inspiration to build subtle animation based pre-loaders that work as the zeroth impression for your projects. This is the reason why array indexing start from 0 instead of 1(source-trust me bro).
